Person1 and Person2 discuss going to the cinema to watch "No Country for Old Men" and then going to McDonald's afterwards.
Person2's house was robbed and all their furniture was stolen, they have already called the police.
Person1 invites Person2 to play video games at their house after school. They will pick up Person1's dad at 6:00 but Person2 can stay for 2 hours.

Person2 became interested in country music after buying a record player and started buying more country music records than any other kind. They then started a radio program called Golden Country Time and began building their own library of country song books.
Person 1 asks Person 2 for help using the washing machines and learns they need to buy soap. Person 2 is surprised to learn Person 1 has never washed clothes before.
Person1 and Person2 are catching up after not seeing each other for a year. Person1 is looking for a new place to live and Person2 offers to help by suggesting an apartment in their old neighborhood.
Person1 got a promotion and is throwing a big party on Saturday with hopes of 150 people attending.
